lyrics:
22 contributorsbe mean lyricsverse 1
they say you like the torture honey but dont forget the whip
my left hands gettin loose but dont let me slip

i dont need a safe word but you dont gotta save me

if pains what you like
torture me all night

chorus
make love burnin love how you keep me hurtin
so oohooh be mean be mean to me be mean to me

verse 2

would you promise that youll always be mean be mean to me
